plot: Esteve, a children's writer and a Scandinavian translator, comes back to La Seu d'Urgell after 5 years living in Reykjavik. While he gets back in touch with his old friends, he doesn't realize that communications aren't working anymore.
title: Les bones persones
plot_es: Esteve, a children's writer and a Scandinavian translator, comes back to La Seu d'Urgell after 5 years living in Reykjavik. While he gets back in touch with his old friends, he doesn't realize that communications aren't working anymore.
